text:
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
Office of Executive Secretary
November 23, 1959
No doubt all members of NAEB have received recent communication
from RCA advising that effective December 1 all stations using RCA-
Victor records must bÂ© licensed by RGAo
Mr* Early of RGA~Viotor assured Mr, Novik a few weeks ago that
discussions looking toward a further concession for the educational
stations could be held after December 1 and if necessary an
extension of time for license would be grantee by RCA. This
information was given your secretary by Mr, Novik after a talk
with Mr. Early.
The letter from RCA-Victor, which apparently went to all radio
stations, would seem to complicate matters, therefore this morning
I asked Mr. Novik by wire to get in touch with Mr. Early and if
possible get a statement from him on the situation.
When I have further information I shall forward it to you immediately o
Cordially yours
Tank E. Sohooley
